goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 225 KB)
indicator_definition: The probability of a child born in a specific year or period dying before reaching the age of 5 years, if subject to age specific mortality rates of that period, expressed per 1000 live births. The under-five mortality rate as defined here is, strictly speaking, not a rate (i.e. the number of deaths divided by the number of population at risk during a certain period of time) but a probability of death derived from a life table and expressed as a rate per 1000 live births.
target: By 2030, end preventable deaths of newborns and children under 5 years of age, with all countries aiming to reduce neonatal mortality to at least as low as 12 per 1,000 live births and under-5 mortality to at least as low as 25 per 1,000 live births
title: Untitled
national_indicator_available: Mortality rate for children between aged 0-4, per 1000 born alive
computation_calculations: Number of children under 5 years old who died per 1000 born alive. Data are based on registration of newly-born children with 550 gr weight and of 22 weeks of gestation
graph_title: 3.2.1 Mortality rate for children between aged 0-4, per 1000 born alive
source_responsible_monitoring_1: Ministry of Health, Labour and Social Protection

ro.goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 225 KB)
ro.indicator_definition: The probability of a child born in a specific year or period dying before reaching the age of 5 years, if subject to age specific mortality rates of that period, expressed per 1000 live births. The under-five mortality rate as defined here is, strictly speaking, not a rate (i.e. the number of deaths divided by the number of population at risk during a certain period of time) but a probability of death derived from a life table and expressed as a rate per 1000 live births.
ro.title: Untitled
ro.national_indicator_available: Rata mortalității copiilor în vârstă de 0-4 ani, la 1000 născuți vii
ro.target: Până în 2030, eliminarea deceselor care pot fi prevenite în rândul nou-născuților și copiilor până la 5 ani, în toate țările având scopul de a reduce mortalitatea neonatală la cel mult 12 decese la 1.000 născuți-vii și mortalitatea copiilor până la 5 ani la cel mult 25 decese la 1.000 născuți-vii
ro.indicator_name: Rata mortalității copiilor în vârstă de până la 5 ani
ro.computation_calculations: Numărul copiilor decedați sub vârsta de 5 ani raportat la 1000 născuți vii. Datele se bazează pe înregistrarea copiilor nou-născuți cu masa de la 500 gr și de la 22 săptămâni gestație
ro.graph_title: 3.2.1. Rata mortalității copiilor în vârstă de 0-4 ani, la 1000 născuți vii
ro.source_responsible_monitoring_1: Ministerul Sănătății, Muncii și Protecției Sociale
